title: Gregory of Narek
summary: Grigor Narekatsi[lower-alpha 2] (Armenian: Գրիգոր Նարեկացի; anglicized: Gregory of Narek)[lower-alpha 3] (c. 950 – 1003/1011) was an Armenian mystical and lyrical poet, monk, and theologian. He is venerated as a saint in the Armenian Apostolic and Catholic Churches and was declared a Doctor of the Church by Pope Francis in 2015.
